tabs.js Script¶

getName(index)¶

Used as a lookup table for tab index to value of the “tab” query keys

Arguments:
  • index (number) – the integer index of the tab
Returns:

string – queryName - the name of the “tab” query string key relating to the index. Returns the empty string “” if the index is out of bounds
changeCallback(index, box)¶

Callback used to change the “tabs” cookie when a checkbox is checked or unchecked

Arguments:
  • index (number) – the integer index of the tab
  • box (Object) –

Asteroid
